entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
